---
name: Bug report
about: Report issues with the mod
title: "[BUG] "
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Please be as descriptive as you can to make it easier for us to try and reproduce the issue.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional Information:**
 - OS: [e.g. Windows, Linux, Mac. Make sure to also include version and/or distro!]
 - Java version: [e.g. 1.8]
 - Mod version: [e.g. 1.0.22_02]
 - GPU: [e.g. RTX 3060 Ti]
 - GPU Driver: [get it from the debug screen]

**Crashlog**
If applicable, please ALWAYS provide the crash log here! You can either get the full log from the MultiMC console (but beware it resets if you relaunch the game), or the log stored in the instance folder.

ANY CRASH REPORTS THAT DO NOT HAVE A LOG ATTACHED WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY MARKED AS INVALID AND CLOSED!!!!
